Headline: 59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 63rd, Union, 59th & Halsted due to fire department activity near 59th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip

#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 63rd, Union, 59th and Halsted due to fire department activity near 59th/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks between 47th and 47th CT.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks between 47th and 47th CT.

As a result, trains are operating only between Central Park and the Loop at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are available between 54th/Cermak and Central Park to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
